variables.systemDescription: The Atomiswave is a custom arcade system board and cabinet released by Sammy Corporation in 2003. Based on Sega's NAOMI technology, it utilized interchangeable cartridges and became home to several high-profile fighting games and shooters from SNK, including titles in the King of Fighters and Metal Slug series.
لوحة ألعاب أركيد تعتمد على تقنية Sega NAOMI، اشتهرت بألعاب القتال القوية من شركة SNK.
Das Atomiswave war ein Arcade-System von Sammy, das auf Segas NAOMI-Technologie basierte und Cartridges nutzte.
